name: Infrastructure as Code Mandatory
description: All infrastructure must be defined as code
message: Use infrastructure as code tools like Terraform for all infrastructure

name: CI/CD Pipeline Required
description: Automated CI/CD pipeline must be in place
message: Implement automated CI/CD pipeline for safe, repeatable deployments

name: Monitoring and Alerting
description: Comprehensive monitoring and alerting must be configured
message: Implement comprehensive monitoring and alerting for operational visibility

name: Database Backup Strategy
description: Backup and recovery procedures must be documented
message: Define and test backup and disaster recovery procedures

name: Auto-Scaling Configuration
description: Auto-scaling should be configured for production
message: Configure auto-scaling to handle variable load

name: Cost Optimization Review
message: Implement cost monitoring and regular optimization reviews
